item.title: [Hyperion] Forcewalk
item.dc:creator: @iBucky iBucky
item.description:
@iBucky wrote:

Past 3 days, I have been working hard to learn Hyperion as I find it is one of the best Sources out there.
Although, I’m fairly confused right now. I have tested my forcemMovement without a world tick and it works fine. But for some reason when I add a world tick. It will not walk…

Here is where I declare the force Movement:

Agility.zamorakBridge(player);

Here is the method in Agility.java:

public static void zamorakBridge(Player player) { int y = 0; if(player.getLocation().getY() < 5345) { y = 5343; } else if(player.getLocation().getY() > 5331) { y = 5334; } forceWalkingQueue(player, Animation.create(6989), 2885, y, 0, 13, true); }
Here is my Code:
Screenshot by Lightshot

PasteBin:
[Java] case 26439: if (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.HITPOINT - Pastebin.com

Could anybody please explain to me how I could fix this.
And if possible how to create a force Movement without making it an Agility obstacle.

Read full topic
